nodes.text: Urchins was a comic appearing in Star Wars Tales 14 and collected in Star Wars Tales Volume 4 and Star Wars Legends Epic Collection: Rise of the Sith Volume 2.

Anakin Skywalker and his friends find a Jedi lightsaber, while Watto realizes he has to bet against Sebulba to keep his shop. While checking out Sebulba's new Podracer, Anakin accidentally drops the saber into the engine, and, while he tries to retrieve it, it ignites and severs some cables. The next day, Watto wins his bet when Sebulba's engines short out.
